ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... er, you are still singing a song for a 9 point damage shield.  a second effect that you cast on yourself should have no effect on whether you are willing
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:50 PM 1/29/01 -1000, you wrote:
>I used to agree totally. Things happen that change your playing style,
>though. For me, it happened when I got some vambraces off Ragefire.
>They're too ugly to wear despite incredible stats, but they cast a
>targetable 9 point damage shield (instant right click cast, like jboots),
>that stacks with psalm of cooling.
>
>While I wasn't really willing to sing a song for a 9 point shield, I became
>willing to sing it for an 18 point one.

er, you are still singing a song for a 9 point damage shield. a second effect
that you cast on yourself should have no effect on whether you are willing
to sing the song or not.


>Kaelrei
>
